article.headline: Toledo 78, Buffalo 62
article.story: BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) -- Florentino Valencia scored 18 points to lead Toledo in a 78-62 win over Buffalo Wednesday night. Toledo (10-8, 6-0 Mid-American Conference) has won 13 consecutive MAC regular-season games. Buffalo (9-10, 1-5) opened the game with a 12-4 run fueled by Andy Robinson's eight points. Toledo responded with a 13-2 run to take a 20-18 lead on a Kashif Payne layup. Justin Ingram, who scored 19 points, sank a shot at the buzzer to give Toledo a 29-27 halftime lead. Keonta Howell added 15 and Payne contributed 14 points for the Rockets. Robinson led Buffalo with 15 points. Yassin Idbihi added 14 points and 12 rebounds, while Max Boudreau had 11 points. Holding a 49-47 lead, Toledo used a 15-3 run to take a 64-50 lead with about five minutes to play. Valencia scored 10 of his points during that run. Buffalo committed 32 turnovers, but managed to outrebound Toledo 40-18.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
